function.name: evaluate
function.description: Runs the string code as a snippet of Xillio Content Tools code. The snippet can contain multiple lines of code just like a routine, and should end with a return() statement that returns the result of the snippet. Optionally parameters can be set to be used inside the snippet. evaluate can be used to construct code during runtime or to import snippets of code from an external source such as a spreadsheet.

example.description: Most basic usage of the evaluate function without a return:
Here the evaluate statement returns true:
